Server.Name: Wild West Mod (A21)
Server.Description:
The Wild West Mod takes you back to the mid 19th Century American Wild West.
Features Include: - Unique Hand Crafted World by Tallman Brad - Exclusive Wild West POIs by Community Creators - Custom Weapons and Tools by Oakraven - Custom Entities - Rideable Horses - Custom Vehicles by Oakraven - Immersive Quests - Custom Traps for Defense and Fishing - Challenging Dynamic Weather - Decorative Spawning Loot Opportunities - Sustainable Farming and Animal Husbandry - and a great deal more...
